Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.actions

Class Performable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.actions.Performable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActivateCard, ChooseCloud, ChooseMagician, DeactivateCard, GrandmaBlockIsland, HeraldChooseIsland, JokerSwapStudents, MinstrelSwapStudents, MonkMoveToIsland, MoveMotherNature, MoveStudentFromEntry, MushroomChooseColor, PlayCard, PrincessMoveToHall, ThiefChooseColor
public abstract class Performable extends Object
Performable class is an abstract shared between every action possible in the game.

    • Performable

      public Performable(String player)

  • Method Details

    • canPerform

      protected void canPerform(Game game, Rules rules) throws InvalidPlayerException, RoundOwnerException, GameException
      CanPerform method checks if a player can perform a move, determined by his objects and game state.
      Parameters:
      game - represents the game Model.
      rules - represents the current game rules.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerException - if the player is not in the current game.
      RoundOwnerException - if the player is not the current round owner.
      GameException - if there is no round owner, or you are the only player left in the game (the game is frozen).

    • performMove

      public abstract void performMove(Game game, Rules rules) throws InvalidPlayerException, RoundOwnerException, GameException
      Method performMove will be overridden by each action to determine the action behaviour.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game model reference.
      rules - the current game rules.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerException
      RoundOwnerException
      GameException
      See Also:
      • canPerform(Game, Rules)

    • nextState

      public GameState nextState(Game game, Rules rules)
      Method nextState will be overridden by each action to determine the next game state.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game model reference.
      rules - the current game rules.

    • nextPlayer

      public Player nextPlayer(Game game, Rules rules)
      Method nextPlayer will be overridden by each action to determine the next player.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game model reference.
      rules - the current game rules.

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Method getNickname returns the nickname of the action's owner.

    • getPlayer

      protected Player getPlayer(Game game)
      Method getPlayer returns the Player reference to the action's owner.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game model reference.
      Returns:
      the reference to the player if present in the game, null otherwise.
